text: The 45th ceremony of the People's Choice Awards was held on November 10, 2019, to honor the best in popular culture for 2019. ==Performers== * Alessia Cara - "Rooting for You" * Kelsea Ballerini - "Club" ==Winners and nominees== The first round of nominees was announced in August, with the finalists named on September 4. ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- ! style="width:50%"| The Movie of 2019 ! style="width:50%"| The Comedy Movie of 2019 |- | valign="top"| * Avengers: Endgame ** Captain Marvel ** Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw ** John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum ** The Lion King ** Spider-Man: Far From Home ** Toy Story 4 ** Us | valign="top"| * Murder Mystery ** Good Boys ** The Hustle ** Little ** Long Shot ** Men in Black: International ** The Upside ** Yesterday |- ! style="width:50%"| The Action Movie of 2019 ! style="width:50%"| The Drama Movie of 2019 |- | valign="top"| * Avengers: Endgame ** Captain Marvel ** Dark Phoenix ** Godzilla: King of the Monsters ** Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw ** John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum ** Shazam! ** Spider-Man: Far From Home | valign="top"| * After ** Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile ** Five Feet Apart ** Glass ** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood ** Rocketman ** Triple Frontier ** Us |- ! style="width:50%"| The Family Movie of 2019 ! style="width:50%"| The Drama Movie Star of 2019 |- | valign="top"| * Aladdin ** The Angry Birds Movie 2 ** How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World ** The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part ** The Lion King ** Pokémon: Detective Pikachu ** The Secret Life of Pets 2 ** Toy Story 4 | valign="top"| * Cole Sprouse – Five Feet Apart ** Leonardo DiCaprio – Once Upon a Time in Hollywood ** Taron Egerton – Rocketman ** Zac Efron – Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile ** Samuel L.
